TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicUpdateMapItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含在动态更新映射中单个映射项目。

span.span: Represents a single map item contained in the dynamic update map.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持的版本控制和 Windows Workflow Foundation 的动态更新功能。This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation. 有关工作流版本控制、 工作流标识和动态更新的详细信息，请参阅以下主题。For more information about workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics. [工作流版本控制Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) 描述工作流版本控制功能在中引入的[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [动态更新Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) 描述如何通过使用动态更新来更新持久化工作流实例的工作流定义。Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update. [使用 WorkflowApplication 标识和版本控制Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) 介绍如何使用 并行承载工作流的多个版本。Describes how to use to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side. [WorkflowServiceHost 中的并行版本控制Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) 介绍如何托管的单个终结点上的工作流的多个版本。Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint. [如何：并行托管多个版本的工作流How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示更新工作流定义，以及承载在同一时间使用旧的和新定义的工作流。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time. [如何：更新正在运行的工作流实例的定义How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示了更新持久化工作流实例，以使用新的工作流定义。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.
